Risk of reduced effectiveness of the glibenclamide due to decrease of its plasma concentrations, because of the inducer effect of the bosentan. Furthermore, cases of hepotoxicity have been reported with these two substances administered together.
Increased risk of the undesirable effects of the bosantan, especially hepatic attacks, due to decrease of its metabolism by the inhibitor
Risk of decrease of the effectiveness of the hormonal contraceptive due to increase of its hepatic metabolism.

CLASS.name: NON-CONTRACEPTIVE PROGESTOGENS, COMBINED WITH AN ESTROGEN OR NOT

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of decrease of the effectiveness of the progestogen
Risk of decrease, large for the rifampicin, of the plasma concentrations of bosentan
Risk of increase of the effects of the botulinum toxin with the aminoglycosides (by extrapolation from the effects observed during the course of the botulism)
Strengthening of the effects, both cytostatic and undesirable, of the fluorouracil.
